item.title: Senate begins final push to give Social Security benefits to 2.8 more million people in move that would further strain fund
item.description: The bill would add an estimated $195 billion to federal deficits over 10 years, according to the Congressional Budget Office.

item.title: Toyota will invest $922 million to build a new paint facility at its Kentucky factory complex

item.title: As Volkswagen workers strike in Germany over pay cuts, carmaker offers Tennesse workers 14% wage hike
item.description: Volkswagen is struggling to satisfy workers on both sides of the Atalntic Ocean amid need for aggressive cost cuts.

item.title: Suspect in UnitedHealthcare CEO murder wasnâ€™t a client of the insurer, police say
item.description: Luigi Mangione was not a client of the medical insurer and may have targeted it because of its size and influence, a senior police official said.
